analysis.description:
MonethaGateway.acceptPayment (/unique_chucks/16/0x4492604eefb7a59885a5b7cbe52d82a0b5614cac.sol#431-473) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- monethaVault.transfer(_monethaFee) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4492604eefb7a59885a5b7cbe52d82a0b5614cac.sol#469)

GenericERC20 (/unique_chucks/16/0x4492604eefb7a59885a5b7cbe52d82a0b5614cac.sol#324-360) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/16/0x4492604eefb7a59885a5b7cbe52d82a0b5614cac.sol#336-340)

MonethaGateway.acceptPayment (/unique_chucks/16/0x4492604eefb7a59885a5b7cbe52d82a0b5614cac.sol#431-473) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-monethaVoucher.applyPayback(_customerAddress,paybackWei) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4492604eefb7a59885a5b7cbe52d82a0b5614cac.sol#465-466)
